question: Can virtual reality help me overcome my fear of heights?

steps.content: Can virtual reality help me overcome my fear of heights?
Plan: 1) Search for information on virtual reality and its use in overcoming fear of heights. 2) Return the answer.
Searching for virtual reality and fear of heights therapy.
Found articles on virtual reality being used for exposure therapy to treat acrophobia (fear of heights).
Plan: 1) Summarize the findings on VR therapy for fear of heights. 2) Return the answer.
Searching for success rates of VR therapy for fear of heights.
Studies show VR exposure therapy can significantly reduce fear of heights.
Virtual reality can be used as a tool for exposure therapy to help overcome the fear of heights.

true_answer: Virtual reality can be used as a tool for exposure therapy to help overcome the fear of heights.
